paragraph.paragraph: The Other Project Items folder (../../../../images/icons/folder.ico) is the fourth top-level folder of an EiffelEnvision ../project.xmlProject. Like all other top-level folders, Other Project Items cannot be removed from a project.

Other Project Items is designed to hold all related, not project-specific project items. Typically the items will be located outside of a project's root location (where the EiffelEnvision project file (*.eifp) is found.)

Unlike the rest of EiffelEnvision's project item related nodes, Other Project Items uses virtual "links" to files, just as Visual C++ does with it's project files. This means a hierarchy of virtual_folders.xmlVirtual Folders can be created without a representation on disk, and files items placed in arbitrary folders not corresponding to any folder location on disk. For more information on "links" to files, see ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxconFolder-BasedReference-BasedProjects.htmItem Management in Projects.

Other Project Files only allows New Folders and Existing Items to be added to it, or any of it's sub-folders (../../../../images/icons/folder.ico). To learn how to add new folders or existing items, see the respective ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_folders.xmlAdding New Folders and/or ../../configuring/adding_items/adding_existings_items.xmlAdding Existing Items documentation.
Existing items and new folder can also be added through the Other Project Items or any sub-folder context_menu.xmlcontext menu.
